A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Hard to believe that the prequels could be out done in terms of being absolute disappointments\, but I guess we'll need to pass the distinction of having directed the very worst installment of the Star Wars franchise to Rian Johnson now!  Total and complete ruination of the story and it's key characters in the mere span of 2 1/2 painful hours.  If I could give this effort a ZERO I would have\, it's complete tripe.
